name: A's
description:
A's

It is a prototype consisting of catacombs. The story focuses on our character who appears in a collapsed room in the catacombs, where he will have to investigate and end up in a room where there is an altar where you will find a key.

altar and with it a key to escape from this gloomy place. 

As he heads for the exit, he will come into contact with the radio of the

The player must pass the skill test to escape from the archon radius.

Once you have escaped their force you climb a flight of stairs to the outside

where you hear an archon in the distance and this is the end of the level.
